Iron Face

helmet (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 186
armor id [armor]: 173 (Iron Face)
protection, head [prothead]: 23
ironskin [ironskin]: 1

Requires 25E to forge (E4)

This helmet will turn the face and the rest of the skin of its wearer into iron. The iron skin is very hard for enemies to penetrate with their weapons.
